short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove ads from Amazon & showcase price history if available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES:
☆ Removes ads, upselling and redundant content from Amazon & eBay.
☆ Control Amazon the way you want! Choose to hide product addons, reviews, and info!
☆ Get early access to night mode!
☆ Adds price history charts to some products on Amazon.
☆ Product images now also include product review images!
☆ Since a lot of unnecessary cruft is removed, the main focus becomes the product, its images, specs and the customer reviews! 

In the future, Amazin plans to allow easy browsing of other sites such as eBay, Esty and many more!

==============================

ABOUT AMAZIN
 
Download Amazin to block ads & upselling on Amazon. 
Amazin prevents Amazon from showcasing sponsored content.

Amazin for Chrome works automatically. Just click "Add to Chrome," then visit Amazon and see the ads disappear!

==============================

NOTES

* The notice you see about having access to your history and website data is automatically generated because Amazin runs on every tab. But it does NOT actually monitor your browsing history or require your personal information to work properly.
